items.label: 57a3cd845457a3854038a22c
items.name: BES - Residential Single Family with Electric Space Heat Delivery Class
items.description:
* Rate Information: https://www.comed.com/Documents/customer-service/rates-pricing/rates-information/current/PurchasedElectricityCharges.pdf

and 

Rate has added to it: Distribution Facilities Charge + Illinois Electricity Distribution charge: https://www.comed.com/Documents/customer-service/rates-pricing/rates-information/current/Delivery_Service_Charges_InfoSheets.pdf

*Adjustments =  PJM service charge, Hourly Purchased Electricity
Adjustment Factors, Purchased Electricity Adjustment Factors: https://www.comed.com/Documents/customer-service/rates-pricing/rates-information/current/PJMServicesChargesFixed.pdf and https://www.comed.com/Documents/customer-service/rates-pricing/rates-information/current/PEArecordforratebook.pdf

* Fixed Monthly Charge: https://www.comed.com/Documents/customer-service/rates-pricing/rates-information/current/Delivery_Service_Charges_InfoSheets.pdf

* Monthly Charge needs to be calculated with Incremental Distribution uncollectible cost factor (IDUF) supplemental to rate DSPP
items.energycomments: Rate = Delivery Service charges + Purchased Electricity charges (Standard Offer Service) | Adjustments = Environmental Cost Recovery adjustment + Energy Efficiency and Demand Response adjustments + Municipal and State Tax additions + PJM Services charge + Purchased Electricity adjustment + Energy Assistance/Renewable Energy Resources Coal Technology Development Assistance charge
